lead_paragraph: Kenny Perry endured a steady rain to claim a share of the first-round lead with a six-under-par 66 at the AT&T Classic. The other leaders — Jonathan Kaye, Ryan Palmer, Jonathan Byrd and Parker McLachlin — all teed off in the morning, before rain engulfed the suburban Atlanta course.
